description: This Dart source file defines routing logic and associated argument classes for a Flutter mobile application. It provides named route constants, argument data classes with optional/required fields, and a route generator function that maps route names to widget screens, passing through specific argument types. It also includes utilities such as a global navigator key and a routes map.

classes.name: ListingArgs
classes.description: Represents optional category slug to initially filter products on Listing screen.

classes.name: ProductArgs
classes.description: Wraps a Book object to be shown on the ProductDetailScreen.

classes.name: CheckoutArgs
classes.description: Wraps a Book object for the checkout preview (visual-only) screen.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: Provides named routes and typed arguments for the app, including route constants and a route factory method.

methods.name: AppRouter.onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Factory method supporting route navigation with typed argument classes for different screens, handling not found cases.

methods.name: AppRouter._notFound
methods.description: Helper method to generate a route showing an error message when route parameters are invalid or not found.
